_sText:
I just love the map cs_assault, but I much prefer to play GG, so i though I should make an version of assault for it. This is my second released map, and if you look at my other one you can see the improvement as I have just been playing with hammer for about a year, really getting to grips with it with out releasing pointless unfinished dev textured full bright maps. That's another thing I hate about GG maps, most people put no time into them, and I am sick of Dev Textures. This was a big project for me, taking just over a month and I really like the result. I want to give out a big thank you to Cheebs as he offered to test my map out before I released it and look for errors and things that could be improved and did a great job of it. Lots of respect for him. If anybody puts this map into rotation on there GG server, please let me know as I would love to play it with you guys. Another thing, If you guys find any more errors let me know and I will fix them, this is only in beta stage. In the final version I am going to try and add a Radar Image.
*** Please Download and Rate! Looking for lots of feedback, so I can improve the map and my skills! ***
